context.p: A new wizard to create T24 Objects and methods or subroutines is available from Version 1.2.0.
T24 Objects created using this wizard would follow T24 Componentisation design pattern and code conventions. This wizard also eases the creation process with auto-generated code.

step.cmd: T24 Object wizard can be launched by choosing File > New > T24 Object
